title: SET_WEATHER_TYPE_OVERTIME_PERSIST
content:
0xFB5045B7C42B75BF0x386F0D25// SetWeatherTypeOvertimePersist
void SET_WEATHER_TYPE_OVERTIME_PERSIST(char* weatherType, float time);Parameters:weatherType: The weather type to override to.time: A float on how long to take to transition (in seconds).Refer to SET_WEATHER_TYPE_NOW for weather types.Old name:  _SET_WEATHER_TYPE_OVER_TIME
codeBlocks:
// SetWeatherTypeOvertimePersist
void SET_WEATHER_TYPE_OVERTIME_PERSIST(char* weatherType, float time);
